content:
Hi there,

I want to ask if there is an entry requirement of adding a new Tier 3 target to the compiler? I have read through the https://doc.rust-lang.org/rustc/target-tier-policy.html page and it seems to not specify if a Tier 3 target needs to have any popularity requirement. Am I understanding it correctly?

By the way, the target I want to add is riscv64gc-linux-android, and riscv64gc-unknown-linux-gnu is currently a Rust Tier 2 w/ Host target.
That's correct, you can just submit a pull request for it.
